We are&nbsp;recruiting suitable candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Procurement Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment type: Full time

Job Summary


	In this position, you will be responsible for planning, implementing, and monitoring our overall supply chain strategy and in order to maximize efficiency and productivity.
	You will discover the best ways to cut procurement expenses, so that the company can invest in its growth and people.


Key Responsibilities
Purchasing:


	Estimate and establish cost parameters and budgets for purchases
	Negotiate with vendors to compare offers, timelines, and pricing to secure advantageous terms for the company
	?Procure high-quality and cost-efficient supplies for the company
	?Develop a sourcing plan for both for local and international sources, so that fast and effectively sourcing operations are possible
	?Analyze the company&rsquo;s requirements and evaluate every sourcing alternative before every purchase.
	?Evaluate letter of credit documents and collaborate with accounting department to ensure timely fulfilment of financial obligations.
	?Prepare all documents for purchasing and making a contract.


Logistics:


	Track orders and ensure timely delivery
	Select transportation routes to maximize economy by combining shipments or consolidating warehousing and distribution.
	?Coordinate with international logistic personnel to ensure proper shipment delivery


Vendor Management:


	Maintain positive relationships with suppliers, coordinating with internal teams regarding their supply needs, and overseeing the purchasing team in their daily activities
	Monitor supplier/vendor performance to assess ability to meet quality and delivery requirements
	?Examine and test existing vendor contracts
	?Research and discover new vendors, vet and add to vendors list


Record Keeping:


	Enter order details (e.g., vendors, quantities, prices, dates) of all purchases made into internal database
	Maintain and update the list of suppliers and their qualifications, delivery times, and potential future development
	?Maintain updated records of purchased products, delivery information and invoices
	?Prepare and send reports on purchases, including cost analysis


Other:


	Regularly visit markets and purchasing platforms and review prices and adjust purchasing decisions as required
	Track and report key functional metrics to reduce expenses and improve effectiveness
	?Control spend and build a culture of long-term saving on procurement costs
	?Identify cost-saving opportunities within the organization
	?Keep abreast of local and international market conditions and advice management if safety procurement is required
	?Develop and update material costs for all supplies and materials used within the company
	?Coordinate with inventory to determine and manage inventory needs
	?Coordinate with warehouse staff to ensure proper storage
	?Work to improve purchasing systems and processes
	?Forecast production and supply needs, in coordination with the Production and Sales Managers
	?Attend trade shows and exhibitions to stay up to date with industry trends
	?Review or update supply chain practices in accordance with new or changing environmental policies, standards, regulations, or laws.


Qualifications


	BSc / HND in Supply Chain Management, Logistics, Business Administration or related field
	Proven working experience as a Procurement Officer
	Strong financial analysis skills
	?Excellent knowledge of sourcing and procurement techniques
	?Strong ability to conduct market research and &lsquo;read&rsquo; the market
	?Good knowledge of vendor sourcing practices (researching, evaluating, and liaising with vendors)
	?Deep knowledge of inventory and supply chain management
	?Ability to work with various levels of the supplier from the local and international market.


Attitude:


	Must be a critical thinker with excellent problem-solving skills
	Must be shrewd and conservative
	Must be willing to work long hours and be very responsive when situations require this.
	Must have the ability to manage multiple tasks efficiently without errors.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV to:&nbsp;careers@jnciltd.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

        JNC International Limited is a leading Turnkey Medical Equipment Service and Solutions Company in Nigeria. Our competences are noticeable throughout the healthcare space in Nigeria as we constantly look to improve and provide quality and affordable solutions for desired need through our innovative strategies for solutions delivery.

We are recruiting suitable candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Procurement Officer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment type: Full time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	In this position, you will be responsible for planning, implementing, and monitoring our overall supply chain strategy and in order to maximize efficiency and productivity.
	You will discover the best ways to cut procurement expenses, so that the company can invest in its growth and people.


Key Responsibilities
Purchasing:


	Estimate and establish cost parameters and budgets for purchases
	Negotiate with vendors to compare offers, timelines, and pricing to secure advantageous terms for the company
	?Procure high-quality and cost-efficient supplies for the company
	?Develop a sourcing plan for both for local and international sources, so that fast and effectively sourcing operations are possible
	?Analyze the company’s requirements and evaluate every sourcing alternative before every purchase.
	?Evaluate letter of credit documents and collaborate with accounting department to ensure timely fulfilment of financial obligations.
	?Prepare all documents for purchasing and making a contract.


Logistics:


	Track orders and ensure timely delivery
	Select transportation routes to maximize economy by combining shipments or consolidating warehousing and distribution.
	?Coordinate with international logistic personnel to ensure proper shipment delivery


Vendor Management:


	Maintain positive relationships with suppliers, coordinating with internal teams regarding their supply needs, and overseeing the purchasing team in their daily activities
	Monitor supplier/vendor performance to assess ability to meet quality and delivery requirements
	?Examine and test existing vendor contracts
	?Research and discover new vendors, vet and add to vendors list


Record Keeping:


	Enter order details (e.g., vendors, quantities, prices, dates) of all purchases made into internal database
	Maintain and update the list of suppliers and their qualifications, delivery times, and potential future development
	?Maintain updated records of purchased products, delivery information and invoices
	?Prepare and send reports on purchases, including cost analysis


Other:


	Regularly visit markets and purchasing platforms and review prices and adjust purchasing decisions as required
	Track and report key functional metrics to reduce expenses and improve effectiveness
	?Control spend and build a culture of long-term saving on procurement costs
	?Identify cost-saving opportunities within the organization
	?Keep abreast of local and international market conditions and advice management if safety procurement is required
	?Develop and update material costs for all supplies and materials used within the company
	?Coordinate with inventory to determine and manage inventory needs
	?Coordinate with warehouse staff to ensure proper storage
	?Work to improve purchasing systems and processes
	?Forecast production and supply needs, in coordination with the Production and Sales Managers
	?Attend trade shows and exhibitions to stay up to date with industry trends
	?Review or update supply chain practices in accordance with new or changing environmental policies, standards, regulations, or laws.


Qualifications


	BSc / HND in Supply Chain Management, Logistics, Business Administration or related field
	Proven working experience as a Procurement Officer
	Strong financial analysis skills
	?Excellent knowledge of sourcing and procurement techniques
	?Strong ability to conduct market research and ‘read’ the market
	?Good knowledge of vendor sourcing practices (researching, evaluating, and liaising with vendors)
	?Deep knowledge of inventory and supply chain management
	?Ability to work with various levels of the supplier from the local and international market.


Attitude:


	Must be a critical thinker with excellent problem-solving skills
	Must be shrewd and conservative
	Must be willing to work long hours and be very responsive when situations require this.
	Must have the ability to manage multiple tasks efficiently without errors.


Method of Application

Regional Manager Job at Shalina Healthcare




        
    

        
        Shalina Healthcare is one of the largest pharmaceutical companies in sub-Saharan Africa. For the last 35 years, we have made it our mission to provide quality medicines to those who need it the most. We manufacture and distribute branded prescription and over-the-counter pharmaceutical and consumer products across various therapeutic groups, including anti-malarial, antibiotics, anti-inflammatory, and nutrition. We have a track record few can match and our brands are among the most trusted in Africa.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Regional Manager

Job Location: Enugu

About the Job
What you become a part of:
     

            
    




	Responsible for ensuring the Lagos targets are achieved every month by proper monitoring of the sales reps working and constantly motivating the distributors.


What to expect:


	Ensure the target set for the month is split up into distributors and achieve the same by focussing on their secondary sales.
	Draw up the sales rep territories and ensure it is covered as per the plan.
	Launch new products and ensure range selling improves resulting in higher sales.
	Expand the distribution network so as to achieve product penetration in entire Lagos.
	Work Extensively with Reps to improve their effectiveness.
	Coaching, Counselling, Training the sales reps to improve productivity every month.
	Competition and Market feedback, conducting periodic market surveys.
	Submit daily, weekly and monthly reports as per company norms.


Essential education, experience and skills


	Minimum Qualifications: B.Sc / HND
	Minimum Experience: 5 years of experience in a managerial position in a multinational pharmaceutical Company, preferably with Lagos Experience.


Job Specific Skills:


	Good communication and presentation skills, aggressive, good leadership and interpersonal skills, good man management skill.


Application Process: If this role is of interest to you, please upload a recent copy of your CV and a member of the Talent Acquisition team will be in touch.
